name: Epic Robot City Fighting
description:
Fight the machine opponent! Utilize your energy to destroy and eliminate your enemies. Enemy robotics are everywhere in your City fighting on ground and attacking from air. Evil & Criminal robot are attacking police, killing civilians and destroying city. This street robot fighting combat. Feel the environment of epic revenge by killing and destroying your enemies. Enemies have done their networking throughout the city. Take courage to crash machine enemies. Survival tournament has begun! Use defenses and attack techniques in this mortal combat. Fail all the violent attacks from enemies to survive in this robot battle game.

Features:
- Real modern Robotics Environment
- Great Robot Controls and Animations
- Futuristic, difficult enemies to battle with!
- Nerve wrecking combat shooting adventures; a pleasing addition to robot battle games.
- Realistic Sound Effects
